articles.author: Fenit Nirappil, Lena H. Sun
articles.title: Ohio pneumonia outbreak is not ‘white lung’ or linked to China, Europe - The Washington Post
articles.description: Pneumonia clusters related to mycoplasma have been detected abroad, but there’s no evidence Ohio is part of a global outbreak or that the U.S. is seeing a surge.

Health authorities are monitoring an outbreak of pneumonia in children in an Ohio county, stressing it appears driven by familiar path… [+6744 chars]
